dmca.title: request to remove banner(website links) advertisement for limo refferal service
dmca.body:
Instituting a new procedure for all limousine company advertisers, and we need your assistance. Please fax your Certificate of Authority from the Transportation Services Authority of Nevada.
 
I need this certificate sent by NOON TOMORROW, OCT. 11, in order for your advertisement to continue running on VEGAS.com or LasVegas.com. Again, if I do not have the certificate by this time, your ad will be removed. 
Please contact me with any questions, and thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. 
Thank you,
Joshua Martin
Advertising Traffic Coordinator
VEGAS.com | 702.992.4837
______________________________________________________________________
please note this letter was sent out on a holiday oct.11.we own both websites and should be covered under the first amendment
